UNLEASH_URL.description: The API URL of the Unleash instance you want to connect to

UNLEASH_API_TOKEN.description: API Key to use on the proxy client sdk

UNLEASH_INSTANCE_ID.description: Typically a hostname, pod id or something similar

UNLEASH_APP_NAME.description: The application name to use when registering with Unleash

UNLEASH_FETCH_INTERVAL.description: How often the proxy should query Unleash for updates, defined in ms.

UNLEASH_PROXY_SECRETS.description: API Key to use on the proxy client sdk
